DoubleVectorProperty.name: ViewTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The pipeline update time for this view. This gets passed to all representations added to this view.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the cache key used to identify which cache entry to use for rendering when caching is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates whether to use cache for subsequent renderings.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewPosition
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the position on this view in the multiview configuration.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of this view in the multiview configuration.

IntVectorProperty.name: PPI
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the screen ppi (pixels per inch). This is used when mapping font sizes in points to screen pixels.

Proxy.name: XYChartViewTitle
Proxy.Documentation: This is the base proxy for XY chart views.

StringVectorProperty.name: ChartTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title to use for the chart. Use {time} to display the current time.

StringVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title font family.

StringVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title font size.

IntVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleBold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title bold.

IntVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleItalic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title bold.

ContextViewProxy.name: XYChartViewBase
ContextViewProxy.Documentation: This is the base proxy for XY chart views.

IntVectorProperty.name: LegendSymbolWidth
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend symbol width.

IntVectorProperty.name: SortByXAxis
IntVectorProperty.label: Sort By X-Axis
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sort the chart data by the x-axis before deciding line plot connectivity.

IntVectorProperty.name: LegendPosition
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend position in the view for custom location.

StringVectorProperty.name: LegendFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend font familyname.

StringVectorProperty.name: LegendFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: LegendFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend font size.

IntVectorProperty.name: LegendBold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend font bold.

IntVectorProperty.name: LegendItalic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the legend font italic.

StringVectorProperty.name: TooltipLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set a printf-style string to build custom tooltip labels from. An empty string generates the default tooltip labels. The following case-sensitive format tags (without quotes) are recognized: '%x' The X value of the plot element '%y' The Y value of the plot element Other characters may be supported depending on plot type. Other characters or unrecognized format tags are printed in the tooltip label verbatim.

IntVectorProperty.name: HideTimeMarker
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Hide the marker that is used to mark the current time, when one of the axes is plotting time.

StringVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisTitleFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font familyname.

StringVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisTitleFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisTitleFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font size.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisTitleBold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font bold.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisTitleItalic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font italic.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisUseCustomRange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use the axis range specified or whether the view should compute the ranges automatically based on the data being shown. The ranges specified by ...AxisRange are only respected when the corresponding flag in this property is set to 1.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisRangeMinimum
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis range minimum for the Left axis.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisRangeMaximum
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis range maximum for the Left axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisUseCustomLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use custom labels for each of the axis. Labels specified by ...AxisLabels etc. are used only when the corresponding AxisUseCustomLabels flag is set to 1.

StringVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisLabels
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify list of ticks and the associated labels to display. If the label is empty, the value of the tick will be used for display.

StringVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisLabelFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font familyname.

StringVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisLabelFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisLabelFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font size.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisLabelBold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title bold.

IntVectorProperty.name: LeftAxisLabelItalic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title italic.

StringVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisTitleFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font familyname.

StringVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisTitleFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisTitleFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font size.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisTitleBold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font bold.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisTitleItalic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font italic.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisUseCustomRange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use the axis range specified or whether the view should compute the ranges automatically based on the data being shown. The ranges specified by ...AxisRange are only respected when the corresponding flag in this property is set to 1.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisRangeMinimum
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis range minimum for the Bottom axis.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisRangeMaximum
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis range maximum for the Bottom axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisUseCustomLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use custom labels for each of the axis. Labels specified by ...AxisLabels etc. are used only when the corresponding AxisUseCustomLabels flag is set to 1.

StringVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisLabels
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify list of ticks and the associated labels to display. If the label is empty, the value of the tick will be used for display.

StringVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisLabelFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font familyname.

StringVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisLabelFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisLabelFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font size.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisLabelBold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title bold.

IntVectorProperty.name: BottomAxisLabelItalic
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title italic.

ProxyProperty.name: HiddenRepresentations
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property is meant for adding/removing representation secretly. e.g. 2D widgets etc. This property is not saved in states nor it recorded by undo-redo.

ContextViewProxy.name: XYChartViewBase4Axes
ContextViewProxy.Documentation: This is the base proxy for XY chart views with four axis: left, bottom, right and top

StringVectorProperty.name: RightAxisTitleFontFamily
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font familyname.

StringVectorProperty.name: RightAxisTitleFontFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font file.

IntVectorProperty.name: RightAxisTitleFontSize

DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis range minimum for the Top axis.
